description: SELECT SNOMED CT code system values descending from 'Change values' (288533004) and 'Courses' (288524001).
name: HSPC Course Value Set

text.div:
HSPC Course Value Set

SELECT SNOMED CT code system values descending from 'Change values' (288533004) and 'Courses' (288524001).

Copyright Statement: TBD

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 288533004
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 288524001
